data.name: textBoxLogSettingsBestSize.ToolTip
textBoxLogSettingsTime.ToolTip
data.value: Total encoding/decoding time in milliseconds. For a single pass, this is the time for that specific pass. After 'Analyze Log', this shows the average time across all passes for this test configuration.

data.name: textBoxLogSettingsCPULoad.ToolTip
textBoxLogSettingsSameSize.ToolTip
textBoxLogSettingsSpeed.ToolTip
data.value: Processing speed relative to real-time playback (e.g., 2x). For a single pass, this is the speed for that specific pass. After 'Analyze Log', this shows the average speed across all passes for this test configuration.

data.name: textBoxLogSettingsCPUClock.ToolTip
data.value:
Average CPU clock speed during encoding/decoding. For a single pass, this is the average clock during that specific pass. After 'Analyze Log', this shows the average CPU clock across all passes for this test configuration.
Indicates actual processor performance under sustained encoding/decoding load. Useful for detecting thermal throttling and power management effects.

data.name: checkBoxLogSettingsSpeed.ToolTip
data.value: Processing speed relative to real-time playback (e.g., 2x). For a single pass, this is the speed for that specific pass. After 'Analyze Log', this shows the average speed across all passes for this test configuration.

data.name: textBoxLogSettingsPasses.ToolTip
data.value: Number of encoding/decoding passes performed for this test configuration. For a single pass row, this value is 1. After 'Analyze Log', this shows the *total number* of passes for this test configuration.

data.name: checkBoxLogSettingsTime.ToolTip
data.value: Total encoding/decoding time in milliseconds. For a single pass, this is the time for that specific pass. After 'Analyze Log', this shows the average time across all passes for this test configuration.

Indicates actual processor performance under sustained encoding/decoding load. Useful for detecting thermal throttling and power management effects.

data.value: Number of encoding/decoding passes performed for this test configuration. For a single pass row, this value is 1. After 'Analyze Log', this shows the *total number* of passes for this test configuration.
